# CSSuggestion.SuggestionKind.custom

**Case**

Sorts the custom suggestions together.

## Declaration

```swift
case custom
```

## Suggestion types

- **CSSuggestion.SuggestionKind.none**: Blocks the system from displaying the suggestion.
- **CSSuggestion.SuggestionKind.default**: Displays the suggestion normally.

items.description: Blocks the system from displaying the suggestion.
